title: Asking about electric vehicle charging
context: Ask a store owner or parking attendant if they have an EV charging station.

content.bestLine: Do you have an EV charging station here?

neutral.text: Is there an EV charger available?
Do you offer electric vehicle charging?
Can I charge my electric car here?
Are there any EV charging points nearby?
Do you have a charging station for electric vehicles?
Is EV charging available on site?
Can you charge electric cars here?
Do you provide electric vehicle charging services?

informal.text: Got an EV charger I can use?
Can I plug in my electric car here?
Is there a place to charge my EV?
Do you guys have an EV charging station?
Can I charge my car here?
Is EV charging an option here?
Can you charge my electric vehicle?
Do you have charging for electric cars?

formal.text: I would like to inquire about electric vehicle charging facilities.
Could you please inform me if there is an EV charging station available?
Do you provide charging services for electric vehicles on your premises?
I am wondering if you have a charging point for electric cars.
Is it possible to charge an electric vehicle at your location?
Could you please let me know if EV charging is available?

patterns.meaning: Asking about the availability of EV charging

options: a place to charge my electric car
patterns.meaning: Inquiring about the proximity of EV charging facilities

dialogs.description: Asking a store owner about EV charging

lines.speaker: Customer
lines.text: Hi, do you have an EV charging station here?

lines.speaker: Store Owner
lines.text: Yes, we do. It's located at the back of the parking lot.

dialogs.description: Inquiring about EV charging with a parking attendant

lines.speaker: Driver
lines.text: Excuse me, is there an EV charger available?

lines.speaker: Parking Attendant
lines.text: Yes, there are a few charging points on level 2. I can direct you to them.
